title: Next Stop Las Vegas for IPCPR 2016
itunes:title: Next Stop Las Vegas for IPCPR 2016
description:
This week on The Cigar Authority, the IPCPR is coming and we discuss all the latest news and rumors as the industry is set to converge on Las Vegas... Will there be any acquisitions, companies closing the doors, or drama? We will preview what is to come....
We will also discuss an article from Dr. Marc Micozzi that suggests smoke can be used to clear the air of bacteria.
Lastly, we will light up two cigars from the care package. The first being Equilibrium and the other being the LFD 1994 Conga...
All this on a special day and time from the #1 Cigar Podcast on the internet, The Cigar Authority.
